item.title: HAProxy dashboards with Prometheus
item.dc:creator: Brian Brazil
item.description: HAProxy is one of many pieces of software that Prometheus provides an integration with. Let's look at how to hook it in and use the built-in console template dashboard. HAProxy doesn't provide pre-built binaries, so we start by compiling it: wget http://www.haproxy.org/download/1.6/src/haproxy-1.6.2.tar.gz tar -xzf haproxy-*.tar.gz cd haproxy-* make TARGET=generic Next we'll configure one a simple […]
